articles.title: Chelsea boss Thomas Tuchel would be 'very ANGRY' if rivals are abusing postponement rules - Daily Mail
articles.description: It was put to Tuchel that Sunday's North London derby between Arsenal and Tottenham could be postponed with Mikel Arteta claiming to have just 12 fit outfield players in the first team.
articles.content:
